examples.example: 在课堂上，同学们都认真听讲，积极汲取知识。

translate.english: In the classroom, students all listen carefully and actively absorb knowledge.

examples.example: 他在讲座上聚精会神地听讲，不时做着笔记。

translate.english: He listened attentively in the lecture and took notes from time to time.

examples.example: 小朋友们在教室里安静地听讲，沉浸在知识的海洋中。

translate.english: The children are listening quietly in the classroom, immersed in the ocean of knowledge.
